100.title: Ant Farms For People With Severe Social Problems
100.text: I'm Marc fucking Andreessen–if I want ant farms I'll get ant farms. Now make me an army of ants for my dominion!

101.title: Uber for Cowboy Boots
101.text: Title says it all. This is a huge need for me and my cowboy friends.

102.title: Drug development has gotten slower and more expensive–let's change that
